body_html:
I am also getting the exact same issue. This is with tensorflow branches r1.5 and r1.8. I tried the following:

  • buidling tf locally and installing
  • installing tf distribution using pip
  • installing tf using anaconda

None of it has worked so far. I have posted my issue on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50347871/segmentation-fault-core-dumped-on-tf-session

body:
I am also getting the exact same issue. This is with tensorflow branches r1.5 and r1.8. I tried the following:

- buidling tf locally and installing
- installing tf distribution using pip
- installing tf using anaconda

None of it has worked so far. I have posted my issue on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50347871/segmentation-fault-core-dumped-on-tf-session
